The identification of the shooter as 36: year-old Seth Ator by the police.
Confirmation from Texas Department of Pu: Oscar Villarreal that no Beto sticker was found on Ator's vehicle or the mail truck he hijacked.
A statement from Beto O: Rourke's campaign manager, Jen O'Malley Dillon, on Twitter declaring the rumor of the Beto sticker on the shooter's car as "completely false."
The debunking of related misinformation: such as the alleged picture of Ator's truck with a "Beto 2020" sticker (which was actually taken from an online store's website) and the false claim that he was a registered Democrat (his voting record indicated no party affiliation).
